item.description:
Debbie has graciously offered to organize this meetup at Abyssinian Restaurant on Thursday 10/22/09. Please note the dinner time is 6:30!! This is Ethiopian food, and a few members have said it was quite good and they'd like to go back there. I had trouble getting onto their website, so I used this one instead: http://www.menupix.co...

Debbie says there is parking across the street at Kinko's and BOA in the back (yellow lines only). She is doing us all a nice service, so please be on time and SHOW UP if you RSVP'd 'YES" within 24 hours before the dinner time.

Let's have a great time and kudos to Debbie.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Abyssinian Restaurant 10/22/09 6:30pm
